description:
This 6 part module covers the topics of dyslexia, common challenges that people with dyslexia experience, simple and fun strategies that can be applied at home or school to not just assist with reading and writing but to also assist with communication, confidence, motor skills, behaviour, and learning.

After completing this module you will learn that dyslexia is a language disorder that does not just impact a person's ability to read and write.

You will learn how the brain is involved in dyslexia and what strategies a parent, teacher or therapist can implement to help an individual with dyslexia.
title: Learn more about dyslexia so you can make learning fun
